AutoGPT

Auto-GPT is an AI agent that, given a goal in natural language, will attempt to achieve it by breaking it into sub-tasks and using the internet and other tools in an automatic loop.

*One-stop framework

An unopinionated, modular framework for building agents like BabyAGI, Auto-GPT, Personal.ai, Pi, Voyager, smol-developer, SupportGPT, Subhub, or any kind of agent or chatbot you can imagine.

Human AI

Human AI is a philosophical approach, rooted in the humanities, for building AI systems that are aligned with human interests.

Broadly speaking, human interests refer to the concerns, desires, needs and values that individuals and societies consider important or worthwhile.

Human AI

agent demo
